story.author: Harry Turner
story.headline: New Office Supply Store to Open Online
story.subheading: Intech Office Supply has opened its digital doors to consumers with an emphasis on modern innovations.

article.p: Intech Office Supply has opened their doors almost overnight in a suprise grand opening. As a special opening promotion, customers will be able to get FREE shipping on their first order!

Catering to the offices of software developers and cyber security experts, their product line aims to improve both workplace comfort and efficiency. Personalized office supplies are also available for additional level of swag.

Some experts wonder how a company of this size could provide this level of excellence at such an early stage of production. Company VP Billy Lumberger was reportedly quoated saying "Yea, if I could just these guys to work a little more overtime, that'd be great".
